item.title: How to add more wildy spots?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“oniscape, post:4, topic:359434”][quote author=free wayne link=topic=455894.msg3337685#msg3337685 date=1284083798]
Imagine the area you’re trying to create a wildy spot in, and create a big square box around it, you might even have to use noclip to get the coordinates. Find this code (or whatever yours is)

public boolean inWild() { if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3966 || absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10366) { return true; } return false; }

And just add another line, like this

public boolean inWild() { if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3966 || absX > *Lower Left X* && absX < *Upper Right X* && absY > *Lower Left Y* && absY < *Upper Right Y* || absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10366) { return true; } return false; }
[/quote]

THIS IS NOT THE SPOON-FEEDING COMMUNITY PLUS YOUR CODE WAS WRONG[/quote]

How did he spoonfeed him you idiot.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add more wildy spots?
